title: Metal chelation as an antibacterial strategy for Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Acinetobacter baumannii
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Advance Article

Martina M. Golden, Amelia C. Heppe, Cassandra L. Zaremba, William M. Wuest
A. baumannii and P. aeruginosa pose serious concerns due to heighted multi-drug resistance. A novel method to reduce bacterial virulence and enhance the effectiveness of antibiotics may be achieved by disrupting native metal homeostasis.
